questionnaire17.title: Initial Registration
questionnaire17.introduction: In order for us to define the next steps in your journey, you must answer the questions below.

A atividade empresarial privada, o inves: Private business activity, investment and innovation are key drivers of productivity, of inclusive economic growth and job creation. We acknowledge the diversity of the private sector, ranging from micro-enterprises and cooperatives to multinationals. We call on all businesses to apply their creativity and innovation to address the challenges of sustainable development.
a atividades económicas que são qualific: economic activities that qualify as sustainable
A company’s impact on the natural enviro: A company’s impact on the natural environment and the energy and Resources it uses to operate.
A Jornada 2030 operacionaliza a Carta de: Jornada 2030 renders operational the BCSD Portugal's Charter of Principles. If you want to have access to all the features of this tool, become a signatory of the Charter
Jornada 2030 renders operational the BCSD Portugal's Charter of Principles. If you want to have access to all the features of this tool, become a signatory of the Charter
A nova praia da Outra Praia: The new beach of the Outra Praia
A plataforma ESG Maturity permite a reco: The ESG Maturity platform allows the collection and control of ESG information from Santander Portugal, to comply with reporting requirements and the periodic monitoring of our public commitments performance.
A unidade de reporte efetua o cálculo d: The reporting unit calculates its GHG emissions
A unidade de reporte avalia os processos: The reporting unit evaluates internal processes to identify ways of reducing emissions
A Unidade de reporte conhece a quantidad: The reporting unit knows the amount of fuel consumed
A unidade de reporte conhece as distânci: The reporting unit knows the distances covered
A unidade de reporte detetou impactos qu: The reporting unit has detected impacts that affect the
The reporting unit identified impacts affecting species/habitats
The reporting unit identified impacts affecting species/habitats and is implementing adaptation measures
The reporting unit has identified impacts affecting species/habitats and is implementing mitigation measures
The reporting unit has detected impacts affecting species/habitats and has measures in place to restore habitat areas other than those it has overseen and implemented restoration measures
The reporting unit identified impacts affecting species/habitats that are reversible
The reporting unit has detected impacts that affect species/habitats external to environmental impact studies
A unidade de reporte detém equipamentos: The reporting unit owns fixed refrigeration equipment, fixed air conditioning equipment, fixed heat pumps, fixed fire protection equipment, refrigerated truck and trailer refrigeration units, electric switchgear and/or organic Rankine cycles containing fluorinated greenhouse gases
A unidade de reporte está a implementar: The reporting unit is implementing adaptation measures
A unidade de reporte fica num raio de 25: Reporting unit is within 25 km of an area
The reporting unit is within 25 km of an environmental protection area or area of high biodiversity value
A unidade de reporte identificou espécie: The reporting unit has identified species on the protection list, such as the International Union for Conservation of Nature's red list or the National legislation, such as natura 2000 network
A unidade de reporte monitoriza a emissã: The reporting unit monitors the emission of atmospheric pollutants
A unidade de reporte monitoriza a produç: The reporting unit monitors the generation of waste
The reporting unit monitors the production of hazardous and/or radioactive waste
A unidade de reporte monitoriza a utiliz: The reporting unit monitors the use of equipment with
The reporting unit monitors the use of equipment with ozone-depleting substances
A unidade de reporte promove projetos de: The reporting unit promotes projects promoting biodiversity
A unidade de reporte que adquiriu bens d: The reporting unit purchased goods during the reporting period
A unidade de reporte realizou estudos de: The reporting unit carried out environmental impact studies
A unidade de reporte solicita o Código d: The reporting unit requests the Code of Ethics and Conduct from its Suppliers
A unidade de reporte tem capacidade de s: The reporting unit has carbon sequestration capability
The reporting unit has carbon sequestration capacity and/or data on its GHG emissions
A unidade de reporte tem medidas de moni: Reporting unit has monitoring measures and has verified a reduction in the number of species
A unidade de reporte tem produção de res: Reporting unit has waste production on site
A unidade de reporte tem uma estratégia: The reporting unit has a waste treatment and/or reduction strategy
A unidade de reporte tem uma Política Am: The reporting unit has an Environmental Policy
A unidade de reporte tem uma Política de: The reporting unit has a Biodiversity Protection Policy
The reporting unit has an Emissions Reduction Policy
A unidade de reporte utiliza água nas su: The reporting unit uses water in its facilities
